content.html: I’m mad at the lady who faked her death to goose her book sales — not for lying, but for being so prosaic. Pretending you were bullied into suicide? Amateur hour. When I fake MY DEATH to increase sales, I’m shooting the moon. There will be pyrotechnics. You only fake die once!
content.value:
I’m mad at the lady who faked her death to goose her book sales — not for lying, but for being so prosaic. Pretending you were bullied into suicide? Amateur hour.

When I fake MY DEATH to increase sales, I’m shooting the moon. There will be pyrotechnics. You only fake die once!
